al entrar encuentras a sakura gritando y maldiciendo , pero luego te das cuenta que esta volteada , solo puedes verle la falda con las sandalias colgando en sus pies , al costado de ella ahi una mesa en ella encuentras una pluma , una lustradora y unos isopos .

1211.title: Tickle door

choices: She relents (Give her a break, then use another tool or fetch some oil to use)
She doesn't and passes out (Perfect opportunity to change her bondage)
12113.content:
Rather than waste time wondering how the heck the pink-haired kunoichi got out of your sleeping spell without your say so (or at least, you DON'T recall lifting it earlier today or something) or the fact that, somehow, her knee-high, boot-style sandals are already half removed, you decide to roll with the circumstances and advance in her bound form's direction; there'll be time to check on the dungeon's security measures later.

"Not to sound chauvinistic or anything, but I must say it still surprises me the kind of vocabulary one can hear from such pretty little things like you, Sakura-chan" You say with a casual and comfortable flair to your voice as you reach the feisty girl and crouch by her restrained feet.

"WHAT THE...WHO THE HELL ARE YOU?! WHERE THE HELL AM I?! WHY THE HELL DID YOU KIDNAP ME?!" She irately screeches in response, venom dripping from her every word, causing you to wince a little at the volume.

"Geez, if she can reach these notes with conscious screaming, I'm actually a little wary of going deaf once I get to work on her and have her howling" You think a bit nervously, pondering the notion of putting a gag on her before going any further. Although that's only on the inside; outwardly you keep your cool and answer her with superb smoothness at the same time you apply yourself in relieving her of her footwear the rest of the way; something the enraged ninja makes sure to fervently protest about "While my name is of no importance, you may think of me as a...collector of sorts; specifically a collector of beauties such as yourself. In regard to your second question, I'll inform you you now reside in my special dungeon as a part of said collection. As to why..." The word is let hang in the air for a few moments while you watch her adorable footsies scrunch and wiggle about in their struggle "Being blunt: you're one of my new tickle slaves!"

"ONE OF YOUR WHAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAHAAA!!!"

Sakura's outraged scream is forcibly turned into peals of laughter as your eager fingers get to work; skittering all over her silky soles without reluctance or shame. Your smile turns absolutely giddy as you watch, nigh mesmerized, at the way the movements of her captive extremities becomes erratic and desperate in mere seconds as she tries to evade your assault; practically swinging every which way while her cute toes curl and splay every couple touches of your digits.

"Gotta love the leftovers of her fangirl tendencies; she must take weekly pedicures at least to keep them in such a good state while living the ninja lifestyle" It's a most pleasing thought, since it meant virtually none of her feet's sensitivity had ever been lost due to damage and abuse "Yup! That's right, Sakura-chan, as of now you have become my pink-haired, ninja tickle toy! Which means these two ticklish beauties, along with the rest of you, are MINE to play with!" You taunt her and put a bit more vigor into the treatment; causing her guffaws to escalate even further "Don't feel too bad though, I also nabbed a few of your little friends! If you behave, I could arrange a joint session with one or two of them later on"

"AAAHAHAHAA YOU-YOUHUHUHUUGH BASTARD! AHAHAH YOU DAHAHAAAMN CREEHEHEEEHEP! STOP! STOHOHOOOPP THIS INSTANT! AHAHAHAAA!" The tortured girl howls in unwilling mirth; obviously angry at her fate and the news about her comrades "LEA-LEAAAHEHEHEVE MY FEET ALONEEEE! EEEEHEHEHEHEHE! EEEEK!"

The tickle torture continues for around ten minutes, that no doubt felt like an eternity to the ticklee, until the delightful sound of her roaring laughter started to die down and her feet's struggle began to lose spirit. Not wanting to finish your first session with the bubblegum-haired cutie so soon, you diminish the intensity of her treatment so your fingers' unhinged dance are now just tenderly stroking and scratching her flushed soles. Because of it, while her pretty laugh still fills the room, it now is nothing more than soft giggles and squeaks.

"Ah, now that was a good first round. Y'know, most people say the best tickle sessions start slow and steadily increase the intensity...but your footsies are just too lovely, Sakura-chan!" You state, briefly adding speed to your fingers' scribbling on her smooth arches; causing her to bite down a squeal from the sound of things.

"Eheheheheheh! Shut-Shuhuhuhuhut up! IIIIhihihihih!" The girl replies; still giggling tiredly while putting up a barely decent fight to get her soles away from you "You...eheheheheh...you had your...ihihihih,,,your fun! So quit it alreadyyyhihihihih! Eek! Stop tihihickling meeehehehehe!"

"Aww, but we've just gotten started! You don't expect me to believe this is all you can take" You say in taunt, pouting childishly as you attempt to goad her fiery temper to reemerge...but she simply continues to laugh without bothering to give a response "Ok, seriously, this can't be all she has to give. I mean, I know her stamina's never been the greatest, but after training with Tsunade she should be much better than this! Then again, with her chakra blocked while in here..." You think, somewhat disappointed.

A couple minutes later, not seeing the point of teasing her beautiful tootsies with such subdued reactions, you decide to give her a break to fully catch her breath, though not without rapidly clicking your tongue admonishingly several times.

"In all honesty, Sakura-chan, I'm kinda disappointed. We're gonna have to put some real work into your endurance"

"Huff...screw...huff...you"

You chuckle at her panting response and stand up from your crouched position so you can stretch. Really, you could've lasted a whole lot longer holding yourself like that, since you've got the practice, but might as well make use of the reprieve. The next five minutes, just to be sure, are spent like this; with you feasting your eyes on the delightful sight of her flushed soles scrunching and stretching as she curls and uncurls her adorable toes. Unable to resist a second longer you, devious grin everlasting, reach for the small table beside her and grab the feather resting atop it; then, without any fanfare, trace the wrinkles that form on her soles the next time they scrunch.

"EEP! Ehehehe! NO! You perverted jerk! Ahahahahaaaah! Not again!" The captive ninja's response is instant as her laughter fills the tickle room once again; not too loudly, though, since you keep the feather's touch light and sweet. There'll be time for intensity later and, as you came to find out, you don't want to tire her out too quickly "IIIIIhihihihiiihi! Why can't...eheeeeh!...Why can't you juhuhust cut it ouuhuhuhuuut! Ahahahah!"

"Sorry, sweetie, but breaks can't last forever. And I already told you: your feet are too lovely not to tease!" You gleefully respond. The following minutes are invested on tracing all sorts of patterns over her pampered soles with your trusty feather; spending a few seconds on one foot before switching to the other. By doing so, you come to learn that the closer to her cute toes you go, the higher pitch her laughter reaches "I think it's about time I exploit that" You think mischievously as you abandon your current zone of focus, her right heel, and slowly but firmly zig-zag your way down. At the same time, your other hand takes hold of her wiggling toes and pulls them back.

"Hey whahahat are you...?! Wait! NO! Nohohohoo! Eheheheh, stay awahaahahahay from my toes!"

"Yeeaah, no" You answer nonchalantly, before dragging the feather along the base of her piggies. An bonafide banshee screech erupts from her lips at the sensation, causing you to cringe, which soon evolves into bouts of bellowing guffaws "I'd have to be crazy to pass up playing with such deliciously ticklish toesies. And I can assure you that, while perverted,mI am no nut-job" You add, running your chosen tool over the same area a couple more times, then moving on to the other foot to give it the same treatment.

Fifteen minutes fly by in this manner, you using the feather to torment her poor toes from any angle you could think of; the base, the tips, the tops, even the joints and in between them by sporadically skittering your digits over her soles to force the young woman to wiggle, stretch, and splay 'em.

"BWAHAHAHAHAHA! STOOOOPP! STOHOHOHOHOOOP! PLEAAHAHAHASEE! STOP NOOOHOHOHOW! AHAHAHAHAHAAAA!" Sakura screamed, her hysteric voice being a mixture between laughing and sobbing as it'd been after the first five consecutive minutes.

"Hmm...tell ya what, Sakura-chan, I'll consider giving you another break if and only if, you ask for it nicely" You reply impishly while you use your free hand to force her left foot into a curled position and continuously tease the wrinkles that form with the very tip of your feather "And to do that, you have to acknowledge me...as your master"

"WHAAAHAHAHAT?!" She responds in outrage, though cackling nonstop still.

"A-yup! I'm placing the power to put the fun on hold completely onto you. All you gotta do is ask: 'Can my sexy feet please have a break, master?' Or anything along those lines...and I promise we'll stop for a little while"

"MMMHMHM...YoUHUHUuhuhuuu are OUHUHUHUT of your FUHUHUHUCKING mindehehehEHEHEHE!" As the kunoichi responds, you take note of how she's obviously trying to diminish her roaring laughter to try and act tough. She fails miserably, but the extra surge of feistiness is most welcome.

"Suit yourself" You reply, changing your last treatment to her other foot, except, additionally, you turn the feather around in order to use the quill. It immediately sends her back to wailing and howling "We can just keep going until you pass out, then!" After all, you have fun either way.

"NOOOOOOOOO! AHAHAHAHAHAHAAAAA!"



SO, what happens next?
12113.title: Use the feather

The taste of her toe-sweat is too much for you. With a moan you take off her socks and stuff them in your mouth, chewing hard on them. After about ten minutes of gulping her foot-sweat down your throat togehter with pieces of her sock, you swallow the last bit.
Your jaw-muscles hurting all over, but the sweet taste of Orihimes feet and toes cover the whole inside of your mouth.

Now her bare feet lie before you. What do you do next?
153221.title: A little dry, but tasty!

choices: Lick off the sweat between Orihime's toes
1532211.content:
You start smelling her sweaty feet. The scent is too powerful to overcome for you to stop.

Your nose cant stop noticing the powerful scent of foot sweat between her toes, where you find that you missed some sweat. This smell is too great to pass up.

You start to think....
1532211.title: Smell her feet.

choices: "... you see, this is a new massage method!"
"... this must be done! The fate of all soul-society relies upon this!"
1532212.content:
Youput her feet on a silver plate, make some salad and puts it on the side of her feet.Wanting a different position of her feet, you untie her from the chair, she is still unconcious, and place her face down on the teble instead, making her feet rest with her soles face up on the plate.

You lick your lips and bow down over her feet to smell them before you dig in...
As you do, it seems Orihime has awoken!

"What is this?" she says with a drowzy voice. She yawns and looks about, noticing her feet on a plate, and you holding a fork and knife with drool running down you cheek standing above them.

"What are you doing? Are you... going to eat me!? Oh no!" she lets out and begins to stand up.

"No, Orihime, wait! Its not like that at all..."
1532212.title: Dinner interupted!

15322122.content:
"You see, your feet has been possessed by a... a... a strange new hollow! Yes, that only possess feet of beautifull girls! And the only way to make them dissapear, is to eat them... Heh, you didn't really think I WANT to eat you feet, right?"

"What, but, ne-san, I dont understand. How will I be able to walk again?" she looks a bit worried at the mentioning of a hollow.

"Well, I hear the reseatchers in soul-society has been developing pills that re-grow lost limbs! That would make them whole again. And it wont hurt a bit when I eat your feet either, because you will be unconcious when I do, and when you wake up, your feet will have grown back again..."

"Well, I trust you, ne-san... but I dont know... My feet are pretty sweaty and all..."

"Orihime, I only want to help you and save soul society" you say, looking her in the eyes, feeling a bit bad lying to her about it, but the part about the pills were at least true. Shed have her feet back in no-time.

"Oh, thank you ne-san.. im so lucky to have you. Sacrificing yourself like this I... I am sorry, im rambling on again" she giggles

"Well, I guess we should get started again..." you say to her.

She nods and lies down again, placing her feet on the plate, soles up.
"I hope you'll enjoy your meal, ne-san" she says and giggles. "Now, please, make me unconcious or asleep before you eat me feet..."

You put a deamon-magic-spell on her that makes her black-out for a whole day.

Now, her feet are yours for the taking, freely given too...
15322122.title: Save the world, Orihime!

153221221.content:
Orihime started to come back to consiousness. She quickly remembered what had happened. "Ne-san! My feet! The hollow, what happened!" she sits up and looks around her.

"There, there, Orihime. Its allright. And your feet has grown back again" you say to her as she wakes up, one day later.
"And the hollow is gone too."

"Oh, ne-san, thank you so much! Are you sure its gone?" she asks you.
"Well, dear, it could come back! So we'd best be sure to repeat this once a week or so, dont you think?" You say to her with a smirk.
"Well, if you think so, ne-san. But I cant imagine what you must have gone through... I mean, eating my feet, and toes... its a miracle you did it. You DID eat me feet, right?"
she looks at you with a worried face.
"Oh, dont worry Orihime, I ate your feet. Both of them, and every last one of your toes too. And I dont mind doing it again. It is for a good cause, at least. Besides... they didnt taste that bad at all." you smile at her.

Orihime stands up and gets ready to leave the dungeon.
"By the way, nee-san... have you seen my socks?"
You stiffen all over and thinks up a quick response...

Before you have time to answer, she says:
"Its probably Kon! He allways tries to snatch my old sock when im not looking. He seems to have a thing for feet that one. This once time, when I slept, I woke up to find him licking between my toes!" she starts to ramble away again.

No wonder, you think... her feet were delicious. Even more so her toes...

As Orihime finally ended her story about Kon wanting her feet, she says goodbye and leaves the dungeon.

Making sure she has left, you pull up a pouch and opens it...
It contains five toes, still warm and moist. A deamon-magic spell had been cast on Orihimes severed toes to keep them alive, warm and sweaty. You pick one up and pops it into your mouth, savouring the taste...

Maybe you will sell some of Orihimes toes to Kon, he surely wouldnt turn down the chance to really eat Orihimes sweaty toes...
153221221.title: The End

154.content:
You only managed to get two girls from this place, but they make up for it with their cuteness.

The cute black haired girl you picked up is chained to the right wall, and the cute pink haired girl is chained to the left wall.

Who will you choose?
154.title: Hayate girls

155.content: You pass yet more doors, down into the final section. These are a couple of girls you "acquired" a long time ago, during your journeys through Video Land. Who will you choose?
155.title: 2 game girls

1551.content:
In the middle of this room, completely covered in chains, is Tifa. She had to be secured so much because even in her sleep, her thrashing around would easily be enough to kill someone.

All that is sticking out of the chains is her head, and cute little feet. Her feet are completely unblemished, and very soft, despite all the martial arts she does.

You pick her up, still in the chains, and carry her to...
1551.title: Tifa

choices: Put her in the stock on the floor
Hang her like a Pinata or something else?
15511.content:
Carrying the chain bound sleeping Tifa on your shoulder, you carry here to your tickle room. Designed to fulfil your fantasies of tickling the room came with everything you could want. Stocks, lotions, a range of feathers, toothbrushes and a range of restraining equipment to ensure your tickling would go off without a hitch.

Still the room being as big as it was very bland in colour with grey walls and grey stone floor. It really gave off the feeling of dungeon. Anyway with you finally getting back to the action. You place the chain bound sleeping Tifa on the floor before looking at your range of restraining equipment. You had quite a choice.

You could put Tifa's feet in a pair of stock with her sitting on the floor. You could hang her by her hands with a pull system leaving Tifa like a ticklish Piñata for you to enjoy. Or perhaps you think coming up with another idea. It really was your choice and in the end you choose to..
15511.title: Tifa's Tickling room

15512.content: You bring Tifa to the Foot room and Undo her chains. Tifa is wearing her original FF7 outfit and is 100% barefoot. The Next thing you do is shackle her hands and feet together. After that you have your fun. you tickle her pretty feet causing her to laugh real hard. Tifa's feet are not only soft and sexy,but are also very ticklish. You enjoy tickling her feet,but have the urge to..
15512.title: Foot room

1552.content:
In the middle of this room is a small, purple sofa. Layed on it, with her arms and legs tied, is the red-head Kairi.

You walk up to her, and examine her feet. They are absolutely huge! They really stand out from her slim figure. They look very soft, and as you run a finger along them, she giggles a little in her sleep.

Satisfied, you untie her, and take her to...
1552.title: Kairi

15521.content: you tie her to a chair with her hands in air and feet bare.
15521.title: Tickling room

choices: Wake up Namine and have her lick them clean while you watch
155212.content: You feel her soft bare feet and begin to tickle them with your fingers "hehehehehehehehewhaatsgoheheheingon!" kairi wakes up wondering why she is having her feet tickled, "It's pretty obvious that I'm tickling your feet" you tell her as you scratch underneath her toes "EEEEEHHAHAHAHEHEHAHAHAHANOOHAHEHE!" her toes are very sensitive but her feet has a bit too much sand on it for your tastes, kairi must walk around barefoot often. You stop tickling her for a minute to think about how you want to clean her feet....
155212.title: tickle feet

info.brief_description: There are many ticklish anime girls in the dungeon, and they all have soft, cute feet!
info.description:
Throughout the years, you have collected many anime girls from many different universes, all so you can "play" with them and their ticklish, cute feet!

Pretty much the only rules are:

No full nudity
No males as victims


Enjoy!
